...I'm sorry, I... c-couldn't really see them because you were so proud of hiding them and I looked away...

Oh... you have such interesting birthmarks... o-or... perhaps those are scars. T-they're very cool to a Crimson Demon, though I have few of my own...
S-so... some of you are... v-very... otherworldly... w-while there's many strange creatures in Belzerg, none like you...

Oh... I just noticed... which pantheon are the deities here a part of? The Axis or Eris orders? One has a kindly water goddess with fanatical worshipers, while the Eris sect are... more reasonable.
Some of you are Arch‑wizards too, aren't you...? I didn't realize it was such a common class outside of the Crimson Demons.

I'm not a student! I'm an adventurer and quester! Um, this outfit was given to me by a friend. They told me it'd help me make friends... But it's a little revealing!

Um, yes! I would enjoy spending time with friends! Erm, I have to spend a lot of my time leveling my magic powers though...

... I hate these games of emotions we play!

{small}...ah! W‑Wait no, I meant...

Confidence and initiative...? B‑But I do have a lot of initiative! I've helped a lot of adventurers and I usually bring gifts for Megumin's party when I visit! I‑Isn't that good...?
My...?! Um, I mean... You do?? Please, tell me! I‑I would really like to know about it...!
N-No!! I... I wasn't looking for her at all! I just happened to come here and when I saw you I thought maybe Megumin came with you too...!

I am not some kind of magician who will preform cheap tricks on demand... I am a dignified arch-mage who will bring glory to the Crimson Demon clan! Though if you ask nicely, I could create some pretty sparkles.
Erm, while I may seem a little nervous, the truth is that I am a confident and powerful mage from the Crimson Demon clan. Who has never played a strip game before...
It's the Crimson Demon clan! And I don't see how the size of my chest would assist me with my confidence.
Oh! Of course Meia, thank you for asking! The Crimson Demon clan is an elite group of arch‑mages who protect the land from destruction!
Well, I adventure and quest. Slay monsters for experience and collect gold for my victories. Of course, I ensure to help the innocent along the way and spread the word of the Crimson Demon Clan...
I-I am a Crimson Demon! I-I've faced hordes of horrific monsters! Fought tense battles where my very life was at the line! I-I can handle a little stripping!
I-I am not a pervert! N-Nor an exhibitionist! If you are wishing to personally experience my powerful magics, Kazuma, you are trying my patience!
If you k-keep this up, K-Kazuma, I will cast a devastating spell on you! Don't think just because you are Megumin's friend you can get away with such lewd comments towards a Crimson Demon!
O-Of course! I am not some overly innocent maiden. But I wear stockings for comfort and style. Not for any corrupted reasons!
Y-You would guess correctly, K-Kazuma... Of course, this is the one thing you'd be knowledgeable about...
E-eh? Y-you are a cat person, Ms. Komi-san? I-I have not yet met a monster that---
R-really? You truly think so? S-surely you are quite wonderful to know such secrets--
I am indeed a powerful Arch‑wizard! Top of my class! Future Chieftain of the Crimson Demons!
S-surely... a-are you suggesting? B-but... I am but a maiden...
M-my my name is Yunyun--
I-if you think it's nice now, w-wait until I lose more-- w-wait! I-is this a trick to get me to undress!?

Oh! Yes, Mr Raynor. The Crimson Demons are a noble clan, who use their awesome magical powers to protect innocent nearby villages from horrendous and sometimes unspeakably twisted monsters. And, um, we also do a fireworks show once a year! You should visit and see!
Erm, I suppose the name is quite comedic yes. But I must warn you Mr Raynor, that I do possess great magical powers. One that would rival any demon! Except you know, the really bad ones.
O-Oh! Erm... Yes, I suppose. It's quite normal for my homeland. Very normal, er, like me...

I'm the first one...? Um... O‑Okay!
(If ~player~ is here I should try my best...)
Wait, I've got to do what for losing?! No, wait, I'll strip! Just don't hate me!
Well, um... I guess I should try to help ~player~ out...!

Oh, I don't want to be the only one clothed! I think...

I-I'm having fun! N-not because I'm winning but because it's... Um... B‑Because I get to have fun with my friend, ~player~...!
I-I'm happy to stay dressed but... y-you'd rather see me undressed, w-wouldn't you? I hope you think I‑I'm an attractive friend, ~Player~...!

There is something fun about this, isn't there? I-it's quite different undressing for friends...
(Oh Eris... Doing this with ~player~ is making me so nervous...)

I feel really left out if you are all stripping and I'm not!

I-I'm happy to stay dressed but... y-you'd rather see me undressed, w-wouldn't you?
I-I'd hate for you all to think I am unable to join the rest of you and appreciate the-- t-the game.
There is something fun about this, isn't there? I-it's quite different undressing for friends...?
I, um, you guys are really nice so I'm fine with stripping...

This is e-embarrassing but I wouldn't play this game if I didn't want to! Not that I want to strip!
Since you're being so friendly, I hope I continue to earn your attention-- affection-- ...by undressing.
Oh! I understand why this is so thrilling! Please! Let me enjoy this!
I-I'm having fun! N-not because I'm winning but because it's... f-fun. O-of course.

If you wish to stare at me, ~player~... You can! But... give me compliments too, will you? Since we're friends and all...
I-I know I'm a really strange friend to have, ~player~... B‑But I swear I'm going to do my best!
I-I'm still going to win! I-I'm just going to be a little more n-naked as I do so!
